alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 5:24PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Eddy and west central Lea Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 524 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles west of Maljamar, or 22 miles east of Artesia, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lea County Zip Franklin Memorial Airport and Loco Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains
